name: Vapor Ascendance
description:
Made for VaporJam over a period of two weeks. Vapor Ascendance is an infinite jumping platform game with chill audio and visuals with vaporwave vibes. It includes an ingame score counter and shows the highest score per playthrough on the title screen (high score resets when you close out of the game). 

Feel free to submit your high scores in the comments, ours is around 50,000!

---Controls: Left and Right arrow keys, or A and D. Click on the play button to start.---

Note: The X on the menu box in the title screen is for aesthetic only, please use the X at the top of the game window to exit. The game plays in windowed mode only.

Credits:

Music is from the copyright-free album Memory Bank by AIRGLOW.

Background art by Zoe S.

Coding and sound effects by Jacob S.

Playtesting by Sammy J and Joanna S.
